name: Cannabis Business
description: Comprehensive assessment of cannabis-related business involvement including legal status, direct/indirect connections, and income thresholds. Excludes hemp-only businesses and permissible exchange activities.
field: cannabis, marijuana, hemp, thc, cbd, dispensary, cultivation, growing

Q1.text: Is the client involved in a cannabis-related business through their business activity?
Q1.summary: Cannabis Involvement Verification - Is the client involved in cannabis business?

Q2.text: Is the cannabis-related activity illegal in the country of operation, or does it include trade or custody of digital assets via a non-permissible exchange?
Q2.summary: Prohibited Cases - Illegal activity or non-permissible exchange check

Q3.text: Does the client activity solely involve hemp business, trade/custody of cannabis securities on a permissible exchange, or face objections from compliance/reputational risk teams?
Q3.summary: Non-SIAP Exclusions - Hemp only or permissible exchange check

Q4.text: Does the client activity involve direct cannabis operations (growing, cultivating, testing, producing, distributing, or transporting cannabis)?
Q4.summary: Direct Engagement - Direct cannabis operations check

Q5.text: Does the client hold an executive management or board of directors position in the cannabis business?
Q5.summary: Substantial Connection - Executive or board position

Q6.text: Does the income from the cannabis-related activity represent more than 10% of the client's total income?
Q6.summary: Substantial Connection - Income threshold for direct engagement (>10%)

Q7.text: Does the client activity involve indirect cannabis connections (providing specialist equipment for growing, leasing land/property for cannabis operations, or investing in cannabis businesses)?
Q7.summary: Indirect Engagement - Supporting roles in cannabis industry

Q8.text: Does the income from the cannabis-related activity represent more than 25% of the client's total income?
Q8.summary: Substantial Connection - Income threshold for indirect engagement (>25%)

Q1_NO.reason: Client is not involved in cannabis-related business

Q2_YES.reason: Illegal cannabis activity or non-permissible exchange - relationship prohibited

Q3_YES.reason: Hemp-only business or permissible exchange activity - not considered SIAP

Q5_YES.reason: Direct cannabis engagement with executive/board position requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q6_YES.reason: Direct cannabis engagement with income >10% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q6_NO.reason: Direct cannabis engagement but income <=10% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence

Q7_NO.reason: No direct or indirect cannabis engagement identified

Q8_YES.reason: Indirect cannabis engagement with income >25% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q8_NO.reason: Indirect cannabis engagement but income <=25% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence
